mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.file_name AS fileName, a.file_url AS fileUrl, a.file_path AS filePath, a.type AS type, a.file_suffix AS fileSuffix, a.file_size AS fileSize, a.props AS props, a.belong_name AS belongName, a.belong_type AS belongType, a.pre_path AS prePath, a.belong_status AS belongStatus, a.create_by AS createBy, a.create_date AS createDate, a.update_by AS updateBy, a.update_date AS updateDate, a.remarks AS remarks, a.del_flag AS delFlag
